title: PepperMate Wooden Salt and Pepper Grinder Set, Black Beechwood Refillable Pepper Mills, Adjustable Ceramic Burrs, Large Wood Pepper Grinder Mill Holds 100g, Small Salt and Pepper Mill 40g
features: Wood Salt Pepper Grinder Set With A Twist - Dressed in a black suit, Peppermate's traditional wooden salt and pepper grinder set is ready for a dinner party! Enjoy a salt and pepper set that brings home chefs superior style and convenience.

Fresh & Flavorful Everytime – Sea salt crystals or spicy black peppercorns – our pepper mill grinder delivers freshly ground, aromatic flavors on demand. Add a crackling crust to a steak with freshly ground pepper or a salty kick to a soup.

Adjustable Ceramic Burrs – Peppermate salt pepper grinder set are ready for the daily grind’, with genuine ceramic burrs. Use both grinders for either Salt, Pepper or a spice of your choice. The large holds 100g and the small 40g.

Smooth Design, Feels Great In Your Hands – Perfectly balanced, smooth to hold, and a pleasure to grind – you’ll use these Beech wooden Salt and Pepper Shakers everyday. Add your signature flavors to every dish you create.

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed – Our beech wood Pepper and Salt grinder set is backed up by a 30-day money-back guarantee, with a LIFETIME warranty. Unleash your creativity in the kitchen, and don’t forget to always season with joy!
description: Peppermate’s high quality beech wood grinders feel warm, smooth and easy to hold. Dual action grinders can be used for salt or pepper.Coarseness and fineness can be adjusted by yourself.The salt & pepper grinder can also be used with other seasonings. These include: peppercorns, spices and sea salt. Maximum capacity for large mill: 100g; Small mill: 40g How to Use: Put the salt/pepper/spices inside. Twist the grinder and voila fresh flavors every timeSpecifications: Material: Beech wood
